details.title: A 474 GHz HBV Frequency Quintupler Integrated on a 20 Thick Silicon Substrate
details.abstract: We present a silicon integrated Heterostructure Barrier Varactor (HBV) frequency quintupler ( ×5) operating between 440 GHz and 490 GHz. By epitaxial transfer of InP-based HBV material structure onto silicon-on-insulator (SOI), a uniform and accurate thickness (20 μm) of the frequency quintupler chip is achieved. In a single stage this device delivers 2.8 mW of output power at 474 GHz, when pumped with 400 mW at 94.75 GHz, corresponding to conversion efficiency of 0.75%. The present device exhibits a 3-dB bandwidth of 4%.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society

keywords: silicon integrated heterostructure barrier varactor frequency quintupler
